article.title: Boeing's Poseidon Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, Seattle, Washington, is being awarded a $9,994,101 contract modification to a cost-plus-fixed-fee delivery order against a previously issued basic ordering agreement for planning and analysis efforts that will address additional increment two, acoustic processor technology refresh capabilities for the P-8A Poseidon aircraft.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
